text: Pia () is a commune in the Pyrénées-Orientales department in southern France. == Geography == Pia is located in the canton of La Côte Salanquaise and in the arrondissement of Perpignan. Map of Pia and its surrounding communes == Population == Population 1962-2008 ==See also== *Communes of the Pyrénées- Orientales department ==References== * INSEE commune file ==External links== * Official Website of the Town of Pia Category:Communes of Pyrénées-Orientales
title: Pia, Pyrénées-Orientales
